question: Which of the following is the best description of “INS Varsha”, that was in news recently?
option1: Second vessel in Arihant class nuclear submarine
option3: Third sailboat of the Indian Navy of Mhadei class
explanation: INS Varsha is a new naval base being developed under Project Varsha for the Indian Navy.This base will be the home of the navy’s new fleet of nuclear submarines and ships.
